Description: This connector brings webhooks to Shopify.
Name: Shopify

Methods.Name: Get Metafields (Beta)
Methods.Description: Get Meta Fields, Transforms response to key value pairs. You will need to add custom response fields to map from. format "metafields.<fieldkey>" e.g. metafields.mytextbox1

Methods.Name: List Meta Fields(Beta)
Methods.Description: List Meta Fields.

Methods.Name: Get Gift Card Count
Methods.Description: Get a count of gift cards.

Methods.Name: Search Gift Cards
Methods.Description: Returns gift cards that match a supplied query.

Methods.Name: Disable Gift Card
Methods.Description: Disables a gift card. Disabling a gift card can't be undone.

Methods.Name: List Gift Cards
Methods.Description: Lists all gift cards.

Methods.Name: Create Gift Card
Methods.Description: Creates a gift card.

Methods.Name: Get Gift Card
Methods.Description: Get a gift card, specified by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Gift Card
Methods.Description: Updates an existing gift card.

Methods.Name: Get Order Refund
Methods.Description: Retrieves a specific refund for an order.

Methods.Name: Refund Created
Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a refund is created.

Methods.Name: List Order Refunds
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of refunds for an order.

Methods.Name: Update Inventory Level
Methods.Description: Updates the inventory level of an inventory item.

Methods.Name: List Inventory Levels
Methods.Description: List inventory levels.

Methods.Name: List Locations
Methods.Description: List locations.

Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a checkout is updated.

Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a checkout is deleted.

Methods.Name: Get Checkouts Count

Methods.Name: List Abandoned Checkouts
Methods.Description: List Abandoned Checkouts.

Methods.Name: List Order Fulfillments
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of fulfillments for a specific order.

Methods.Name: Get Order Fulfillment
Methods.Description: Retrieve a specific fulfillment.

Methods.Name: Get Order
Methods.Description: Get order by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Fulfillment Tracking Information

Methods.Name: Create Order Fulfillment
Methods.Description: Create a fulfillment for the specified order and line items.

Methods.Name: List New Orders
Methods.Description: List orders created since last run.

Methods.Name: List Updated Orders
Methods.Description: List orders updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Orders
Methods.Description: List orders.

Methods.Name: Create Order
Methods.Description: Creates an order. By default, product inventory is not claimed.

Methods.Name: Order Deletion
Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a order is deleted.

Methods.Name: Order Fulfillment
Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a order is fulfilled.

Methods.Name: Order Cancellation

Methods.Description: This webhook is triggered when a order is updated.

Methods.Name: Order Created

MetaDescription: Automate your users' monotonous eCommerce admin tasks by integrating Shopify and your business app with Cyclr's automation workflow builder.
Content:
Shopify’s powerful eCommerce platform creates flexible and beautiful online stores that can be set up in no time.

Cyclr allows you to integrate Shopify with a wide range of Cloud business apps, including your own application, so you can create your own time-saving automation workflows, enhancing marketing, customer data management, support, billing and much more!
